Title: Advanced 3R regenerator scheme for high spectral efficient signal waveforms
Abstract: © 2015 IEEE.We propose a novel 3R regenerator architecture for highly spectral efficient signals. Through numerical simulations we evaluate its performance and compare with traditional 2R schemes. The results of the analysis demonstrate necessity of 3R for regeneration of NRZ pulses and its relevance for future high capacity transmission systems.
